title: Rejection
description:
Matt Koff, Laura Swearingen-Steadwell and Patti Smith share stories about a wedding engagement, an encounter on a Greyhound, and good girls breaking bad.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Matt Koff, Laura Swearingen-Steadwell, Ofenbach, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, The Whitefield Brothers, Patti Smith, The Killers)
